original_text: Then the men of Israel turned, and the men of Benjamin were dismayed, for they saw that disaster was close upon them.
korean_text: 이스라엘 사람은 돌아서는지라 베냐민 사람들이 화가 자기들에게 미친 것을 보고 심히 놀라

sentences.original_text: Then the men of Israel turned
and the men of Benjamin were dismayed
that disaster was close upon them.
